entries.description: Handle markdown-style links [text](url) before standalone URLs
Robust sentence matching and accordion rule styling
Use plain text for highlighting, not Meilisearch formatted text
Prevent URL mangling from em/mark tags inside links
Fix collections metadata, add URL hyperlinking, match reader styling
Redesign search input with inline button, improve mobile layout
Bold keywords without green color, improve summary grammar
Use <b> tag for bolded keywords in relevant sentence
Sentence highlighting, stats transparency, line spacing
Summary text prominent (white), document title muted (gray)
